Package piece

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • piece.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a chess piece

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece​(Board board,
             Square square,
             Color color,
             int numPaths)
        Initializes a piece
        Parameters:
        board - Board the piece is on
        square - Square the piece is on
        color - Color of the piece
        numPaths - Number of paths this piece can take when moving

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public java.lang.String move​(Square square)
        Moves the piece if allowed
        Parameters:
        square - The square to move the piece to. Must be empty or have opponents piece.
        Returns:
        Null if piece moved, message otherwise

      • forceMove

        protected void forceMove​(Square square)
        Move this piece without any checks
        Parameters:
        square - The destination

      • goBack

        public void goBack()
        Restores previous state of the board after this piece moved
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the piece cannot go back because it only supports going back one move

      • canMove

        public java.lang.String canMove​(Square square)
        Checks if this piece can move to square
        Parameters:
        square - The destination
        Returns:
        Null if this piece can move to square, otherwise a message

      • canAttack

        public boolean canAttack​(Square square)
        Parameters:
        square - Square to check if this piece can attack
        Returns:
        True if this piece can move to square, otherwise false

      • isSafe

        public boolean isSafe​(Square square)
        Checks if any of the opposing pieces can attack this piece if it went on square
        Parameters:
        square - The square whos safeness is being checked
        Returns:
        True if square is safe, otherwise false

      • changeTo

        public void changeTo​(PieceConstructor constructor)
        Change this piece
        Parameters:
        constructor - The constructor used to create a new piece that will replace this piece

      • nextCoordinate

        protected abstract Coordinate nextCoordinate​(int pathNum,
                                             int stepNum,
                                             Coordinate c)
        Implement this to get the next coordinate when building the path to the destination square
        Parameters:
        pathNum - The number of the current path (1 to numPaths)
        stepNum - The number of the current step in the path (starts at 1)
        c - The current coordinate
        Returns:
        The next coordinate

      • stepCondition

        protected abstract boolean stepCondition​(int pathNum,
                                         int stepNum,
                                         Coordinate c)
        Implement this to see if the piece should take the next step when building the path to the destination
        Parameters:
        pathNum - The number of the current path (1 to numPaths)
        stepNum - The number of the current step in the path (starts at 1 representing the starting position)
        c - The current coordinate, it is in the board
        Returns:
        True if should take step, otherwise false

      • canMove

        protected abstract java.lang.String canMove​(boolean found,
                                            int pathNum,
                                            java.util.List<Square> path)
        Implement this to check if the piece can move
        Parameters:
        found - If the destination was found
        pathNum - Number of the path the destination was found in (1 to numPaths)
        path - The path where the destination was found
        Returns:
        Null if can move, otherwise a message

      • yForward

        protected int yForward​(int n)
        Parameters:
        n - Number of spaces forward
        Returns:
        Y coordinate of this piece if it were to go forward n spaces

      • yBack

        protected int yBack​(int n)
        Parameters:
        n - Number of spaces to go back
        Returns:
        Y coordinate of this piece if it were to go back n spaces

      • xRight

        protected int xRight​(int n)
        Parameters:
        n - Number of spaces to go right
        Returns:
        X coordinate of this piece if it were to go right n spaces

      • xLeft

        protected int xLeft​(int n)
        Parameters:
        n - Number of spaces to go left
        Returns:
        X coordinate of this piece if it were to go left n spaces

      • getColor

        public Color getColor()
        Returns:
        Color of the piece

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Returns:
        The board this piece is on

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare()
        Returns:
        The square this piece is on

      • hasMoved

        public boolean hasMoved()
        Returns:
        True if this piece has been moved from its original spot, otherwise false

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
